HED.VI.summary: Maschinenfabrik HEID AG engages in the wholesale of machinery in Austria. It offers machine tools and spare parts for turning machines, and related services; as well as real estate services. The company also engages in real estate marketing and leasing; and investment management activities. It serves corporate customers through its Website and telephone. The company was founded in 1883 and is headquartered in Stockerau, Austria.
